Anjo has led a transformational change process of merging Oxfam affiliates at country and regional level on basis of a joint strategy and a shared structure in Asia. This change process is aiming at more synergy, more impact and more efficiency. In this process it is key to ensure sufficient staff ownership and to keep focus on end-result. Anjo has realized a complex process of decentralization, including setting-up of three new country offices in South Asia.

Anjo has actively engaged with donors (EC; ECHO; Dutch government; SIDA; etc) to raise funds.
